description: This file defines a CMake macro 'CreateDepPackage' used for automating the creation of Debian package files (.deb). It processes input arguments to generate build configuration for packaging software components, including setting package metadata and dependencies.

methods.name: CreateDepPackage
methods.description: A macro that creates a Debian package configuration based on provided component names, version, maintainer, description, and other metadata. It sets up CPack variables accordingly and includes packaging instructions.
